com.ihealth.communication.control

Class ABPMControl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ihealth.communication.control.ABPMControl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DeviceControl

    public class ABPMControl
extends java.lang.Object
implements DeviceControl
    Public API for the ABPM

    The class provides methods to control ABPM device. You need to call the device method, and then call the connection method

    If you want to connect a ABPM device, you need to calliHealthDevicesManager.startDiscovery(long) to discovery a new ABPM device, and then calliHealthDevicesManager.connectDevice(java.lang.String, java.lang.String, java.lang.String)to connect ABPM device.

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void deleteAllMemory()
      Get the value of historical data in the ABPM This is an asynchronous call, it will return immediately. If get successfully, following callback will be triggered:
      iHealthDevicesCallback.onDeviceNotify(String mac, String deviceType, String action, String message)
      If error happens, following callback will be triggered:
      iHealthDevicesCallback.onDeviceNotify(String mac, String deviceType, String action, String message)
      The action will be BpProfile.ACTION_ERROR_BP The message will be a JSON string with error ID and description,
      the keys will show in the KeyList of the action.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ABPMControl

        public ABPMControl(android.content.Context context,
                   com.ihealth.communication.base.comm.BaseComm com,
                   java.lang.String userName,
                   java.lang.String mac,
                   java.lang.String name,
                   com.ihealth.communication.ins.InsCallback insCallback,
                   com.ihealth.communication.base.comm.BaseCommCallback mBaseCommCallback)
        A construct of ABPMControl
        Parameters:
        context - Context.
        com - class for communication.
        userName - the identification of the user, could be the form of email address or mobile phone.
        mac - valid Ble address(without colon).
        insCallback - Po3 device callback.
        mBaseCommCallback - class for communication.

    • Method Detail

      • getIdps

        public java.lang.String getIdps()
        Get the ABPM information
        • Attention, call iHealthDevicesManager.registerClientCallback(iHealthDevicesCallback) firstly.
        • This is an asynchronous call, it will not return immediately. After get the battery status, Callback iHealthDevicesCallback.onDeviceNotify(String, String, String, String) will be triggered.
        • The action of the callback is iHealthDevicesIDPS.MSG_IHEALTH_DEVICE_IDPS.
        • Thr Keys of message will show in the KeyList of iHealthDevicesIDPS.MSG_IHEALTH_DEVICE_IDPS.

      • getBattery

        public void getBattery()
        Get the ABPM battery status
        • Attention, call iHealthDevicesManager.registerClientCallback(iHealthDevicesCallback) firstly.
        • This is an asynchronous call, it will not return immediately. After get the battery status, Callback iHealthDevicesCallback.onDeviceNotify(String, String, String, String) will be triggered.
        • The action of the callback is BpProfile.ACTION_BATTERY_BP.
        • Thr Keys of message will show in the KeyList of BpProfile.ACTION_BATTERY_BP.
        • If error happens, following callback will be triggered:
          iHealthDevicesCallback.onDeviceNotify(String mac, String deviceType, String action, String message)
          • The action will be BpProfile.ACTION_ERROR_BP
          • The message will be a JSON string with error ID and description,
            the keys will show in the KeyList of the action.
        • Attention, it is mandatory to call following method before you call this method:
          iHealthDevicesManager.registerClientCallback(iHealthDevicesCallback)

      • getFunctionInfo

        public void getFunctionInfo()
        sync real time:Synchronize the system time to ABPM device.
        • Attention, call iHealthDevicesManager.registerClientCallback(iHealthDevicesCallback) firstly.
        • This is an asynchronous call, it will not return immediately. Callback iHealthDevicesCallback.onDeviceNotify(String, String, String, String) will be triggered.
        • The action of the callback is BpProfile.ACTION_FUNCTION_INFORMATION_BP.
        • Thr Keys of return message will show in the KeyList of BpProfile.ACTION_FUNCTION_INFORMATION_BP.
        • If error happens, following callback will be triggered:
          iHealthDevicesCallback.onDeviceNotify(String mac, String deviceType, String action, String message)
          • The action will be BpProfile.ACTION_ERROR_BP
          • The message will be a JSON string with error ID and description,
            the keys will show in the KeyList of the action.
        • Attention, it is mandatory to call following method before you call this method:
          iHealthDevicesManager.registerClientCallback(iHealthDevicesCallback)

      • setDisplayUnit

        public void setDisplayUnit(int unit)
        Set the display unit
        • This is an asynchronous call, it will return immediately.
        • If set/unset successfully, following callback will be triggered:
          iHealthDevicesCallback.onDeviceNotify(String mac, String deviceType, String action, String message)
          • The action is BpProfile.ACTION_SET_UNIT_SUCCESS_BP.
          • The message will be null.
        • If error happens, following callback will be triggered:
          iHealthDevicesCallback.onDeviceNotify(String mac, String deviceType, String action, String message)
          • The action will be BpProfile.ACTION_ERROR_BP
          • The message will be a JSON string with error ID and description,
            the keys will show in the KeyList of the action.
        • Attention, it is mandatory to call following method before you call this method:
          iHealthDevicesManager.registerClientCallback(iHealthDevicesCallback)
        Parameters:
        unit - display unit. The unit of UNIT_MMHG and UNIT_KPA.

      • setMeasureTime

        public void setMeasureTime(int length,
                           boolean isMedicine,
                           int[]... times)
        Set automatic cycle measurement setup.
        • This is an asynchronous call, it will return immediately.
        • If set/unset successfully, following callback will be triggered:
          iHealthDevicesCallback.onDeviceNotify(String mac, String deviceType, String action, String message)
          • The action is BpProfile.ACTION_SET_CYCLE_MEASURE_SUCCESS.
          • The message will be null.
        • If error happens, following callback will be triggered:
          iHealthDevicesCallback.onDeviceNotify(String mac, String deviceType, String action, String message)
          • The action will be BpProfile.ACTION_ERROR_BP
          • The message will be a JSON string with error ID and description,
            the keys will show in the KeyList of the action.
        • Attention, it is mandatory to call following method before you call this method:
          iHealthDevicesManager.registerClientCallback(iHealthDevicesCallback)
        Parameters:
        length - Measure time length, unit is hour.
        isMedicine - Whether the user take medicine
        times - Measuring time array , Maximum 4 is variable in length. Each time array is 4, the first time to measure the number of hours, number of minutes of the second for measuring time, a third for measuring intervals on the number of minutes, a fourth way to remind(value:0,1,2,3): 0:vibration off and sound off 1:vibration on and sound off 2:vibration off and sound on 3:vibration on and sound on

      • getMeasureTime

        public void getMeasureTime()
        Get automatic cycle measurement setup.
        • This is an asynchronous call, it will return immediately.
        • If get successfully, following callback will be triggered:
          iHealthDevicesCallback.onDeviceNotify(String mac, String deviceType, String action, String message)
          • The action is BpProfile.ACTION_GET_CYCLE_MEASURE.
          • The keys of the message will show in KeyList of the action.
        • If error happens, following callback will be triggered:
          iHealthDevicesCallback.onDeviceNotify(String mac, String deviceType, String action, String message)
          • The action will be BpProfile.ACTION_ERROR_BP
          • The message will be a JSON string with error ID and description,
            the keys will show in the KeyList of the action.
        • Attention, it is mandatory to call following method before you call this method:
          iHealthDevicesManager.registerClientCallback(iHealthDevicesCallback)

      • setAlarm

        public void setAlarm(int[]... args)
        Set automatic cycle measurement setup.
        • This is an asynchronous call, it will return immediately.
        • If set/unset successfully, following callback will be triggered:
          iHealthDevicesCallback.onDeviceNotify(String mac, String deviceType, String action, String message)
        • If error happens, following callback will be triggered:
          iHealthDevicesCallback.onDeviceNotify(String mac, String deviceType, String action, String message)
          • The action will be BpProfile.ACTION_ERROR_BP
          • The message will be a JSON string with error ID and description,
            the keys will show in the KeyList of the action.
        • Attention, it is mandatory to call following method before you call this method:
          iHealthDevicesManager.registerClientCallback(iHealthDevicesCallback)
        Parameters:
        args - Alarm parameters array , Maximum 6 is variable in length,Each set of parameters length is 4. The first parameter to alarm type The second parameter for the alarm switch(value:0,1,2,3): 0:sound off and visual off 1:sound on and visual off 2:sound off and visual on 3:sound on and visual on The third parameters for alarm limit, The fourth parameters for alarm lower limit

      • getAlarmSetting

        public void getAlarmSetting()
        Get automatic cycle measurement setup.
        • This is an asynchronous call, it will return immediately.
        • If get successfully, following callback will be triggered:
          iHealthDevicesCallback.onDeviceNotify(String mac, String deviceType, String action, String message)
          • The action is BpProfile.ACTION_ALARM_SETTING_BP.
          • The keys of the message will show in KeyList of the action.
        • If error happens, following callback will be triggered:
          iHealthDevicesCallback.onDeviceNotify(String mac, String deviceType, String action, String message)
          • The action will be BpProfile.ACTION_ERROR_BP
          • The message will be a JSON string with error ID and description,
            the keys will show in the KeyList of the action.
        • Attention, it is mandatory to call following method before you call this method:
          iHealthDevicesManager.registerClientCallback(iHealthDevicesCallback)

        public void getOfflineNum()
        Get the number of historical data in the ABPM,select memory size.
        • This is an asynchronous call, it will return immediately.
        • If get successfully, following callback will be triggered:
          iHealthDevicesCallback.onDeviceNotify(String mac, String deviceType, String action, String message)

          • The keys of the message will show in KeyList of the action.
